title: 传伊斯兰国头目巴格达迪被美军打死，美国政府明早宣布
contents:
美国政府明天早上很可能宣布ISIS头目巴格达迪被美军打死。

BREAKING: High-value target, believed to be ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, killed in U.S. operation in northwest Syria, sources say; DNA results pending - Fox News

source:
https://twitter.com/BNONews/status/1188296165575540736?s=19
